verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:18
verses.text: Now some are puffed up, as though I would not come to you.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:19
verses.text: But I will come to you shortly, if the Lord will, and will know, not the speech of them which are puffed up, but the power.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:20
verses.text: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 4:21
verses.text: What will ye? shall I come unto you with a rod, or in love, and in the spirit of meekness?
